title: Transport🚍🌍
text:
Welcome to Clemson! 🎉
As an international student, getting around town and campus is easy with these transportation options. 🚀

Catbus!






Hop aboard the magical Catbus and discover an enchanted journey through treetops and moonlit meadows.
✅ Fare-Free Service – No cost for students & residents!
✅ Routes – Covers Clemson University, downtown Clemson, Seneca, and Anderson.
✅ Schedule & Info – Check routes Here








✈️ Airport Transportation
🛫 Nearest Airport – Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport (GSP) (45 min from Clemson)
🛬 Other Airports – Charlotte Douglas (CLT) & Atlanta (ATL) (~2.5 hrs away)
🚐 Tiger Transit Airport Shuttle – Free shuttle during university breaks! Reserve a seat here




Airport (GSP)






🚗 Ride with Uber






Uber is a global platform that connects riders with drivers, making transportation more accessible in over 70 countries and 10,000+ cities. Whether you’re commuting, exploring, or just need a lift, Uber makes it easy to get where you’re going. 🌍📱
🚀 Visit Uber Website

title: Housing
text:
Finding the perfect place to live is an important part of settling into Clemson as an international student. Here’s a guide to housing options available in the area! 🌍🎓




🏡 Dockside Clemson
📍 Location – Clemson, SC
🔹 Features – Shuttle to campus, study rooms, resort-style pool, fitness center.
🔗 Visit Dockside Clemson


🏡 Clemson Lofts
📍 Location – 111 Cochran Rd, Clemson, SC 29631
📞 Contact – (864) 302-7845
🔹 Features – Pet-friendly, fitness center, study spaces, private suites.
🔗 Visit Clemson Lofts


🏡 Clemson Edge
📍 Location – 700 Berkeley Place Cir, Clemson, SC 29631
📞 Contact – (864) 305-4199
🔹 Features – Two- and four-bedroom apartments, student-friendly amenities.
🔗 Visit Clemson Edge





🏡 Clemson Village
📍 Location – 31 Clemson Place Cir, Clemson, SC 29631
📞 Contact – (864) 653-9500
🔹 Features – Fully furnished duplexes, private bathrooms, walk-in closets.
🔗 Visit Clemson Village


🏡 University Village at Clemson
📍 Location – 103 University Village Dr, Central, SC 29630
📞 Contact – (864) 713-1953
🔹 Features – Three- and four-bedroom apartments, roommate matching.
🔗 Visit University Village


🏡 Heritage Pointe at Clemson
📍 Location – 811 Issaqueena Trail, Central, SC 29630
📞 Contact – (864) 653-7717
🔹 Features – One- and two-bedroom garden-style apartments, peaceful setting, 2 miles from campus, CATbus access.
🔗 Visit Heritage Pointe Apartments

title: Explore Your Future
text:

title: Visa Information for International Students
text:
Planning to study at Clemson?😊
Here’s everything you need to know about visas!

title: Visa Information for International Students
text:
Visa Types



F-1 Visa 🎓


The most common visa for international students enrolled in academic degree programs at a U.S. college or university.



Full-time study required


Work: Limited on-campus; CPT/OPT options


I-20 issued by school





J-1 Visa 🔄


For students, scholars, or professors under exchange programs sponsored by institutions or governments.



Work: Training or research allowed


DS-2019 required


May require returning to home country





M-1 Visa 🔧


Designed for vocational or nonacademic programs (e.g., technical schools, mechanical training).



Less flexible than F-1


Work only with permission


Strict timelines






📝 How to Apply



Receive Your I-20 or DS-2019 from Clemson


Pay the SEVIS Fee ($350)


Complete DS-160 Form online


Schedule Visa Interview at U.S. embassy/consulate


Prepare Documents:


Valid passport


Financial proof


Admission letter





Clemson International Website U.S. Visa Info

title: Scholarships and Grants
text:
🎓💰 Here are some scholarships and grants that high school students can apply for:



South Carolina Scholarships







NotePalmetto Fellows Scholarship



💰 Up to $7,500 per year
📅 Deadline: Rolling
📚 3.5 GPA & 1200 SAT required
Apply Now










NoteLIFE Scholarship



💰 Varies by institution
📅 Deadline: Varies
📚 3.0 GPA & 1100 SAT required
Learn More

NoteCoca-Cola Scholars



💰 $20,000 award
📅 October 31, 2025
🏆 Leadership focus
Apply Now

💰 $1,000-$100,000

🔬 STEM research
Learn More

title: ESOL
text:
🏫 Clemson University
📍 Location – Clemson, SC
📞 Contact – Visit Clemson University, South Carolina
🔹 International Student Services
🔹 top-ranked public research university
🔹 Programs & Majors
🔹 English Language Support







🏫 D.W. Daniel High School
📍 Location – 140 Blue And Gold Blvd, Central, SC 29630
📞 Contact – (864) 397-2900
🔹 Advanced Placement (AP) Courses – College-level classes for high-achieving students.
🔹 Extracurricular Activities – Sports, clubs, and leadership programs.
🔗 Visit Daniel High School






🏫 R.C. Edwards Middle School
📍 Location – 1157 Madden Bridge Road, Central, SC 29630
📞 Contact – (864) 397-4200
🔹 STEM Programs – Science, technology, engineering, and math-focused curriculum.
🔹 Student Support Services – Counseling and academic assistance.
🔗 Learn More












🏫 Elementary Schools
🔹 Clemson Elementary School – Known for its strong academic performance and STEM programs.
🔹 Central Elementary School – Offers innovative learning programs and student enrichment activities.
🔹 Six Mile Elementary School – Recognized for high student achievement and community involvement.
🔗 Explore Local Schools






📚 Additional Resources
✅ School District Information – Clemson schools are part of Pickens County School District, known for its high academic rankings.
✅ International Student Support – Clemson University provides guidance for families with school-age children.

For more details, visit Clemson’s education guide here.

title: ESOL
text:
🛍️ Amazon Fresh

Online Grocery Delivery – Order fresh produce, snacks, and essentials

Amazon Prime Benefits – Free delivery with Prime

International Foods – Wide global selection




🏪 Walmart Neighborhood Market

Location – 680 Old Greenville Hwy

Hours – Open 6 AM – 11 PM

Services – Grocery, pharmacy, bakery, deli

Pickup – Curbside available




🥦 Ingles Markets

Location – 854 Old Greenville Hwy

Hours – Open 6 AM – 12 AM

Specialty Items – Organic & international food

Pharmacy & Pickup – Super convenient




Each store offers fresh produce, pantry staples, and global grocery options. 😊
